text: Exile (written as EXILE, , ) is a Japanese boy band. It has 16 members. Atsushi and Takahiro are the singers, the other members are dancers. Nesmith and Shokichi are in both the singers and dancers category. ==References== == Other websites == * EXILE Official Website * EXILE mobile global * EXILE mobile * EX FAMILY -EXILE TRIBE OFFICIAL FAN CLUB- * Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:Japanese boy bands Category:Japanese pop music groups
title: Exile (Japanese band)
